main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported over Norfolk, Virginia between January 1 and January 25, 1967.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing a moving and stationary bright light resembling a search light., One sighting lasted about 90 minutes with an object described as round and emitting a yellow-white light., The object was observed at an altitude of about 2000 feet traveling at over 500 mph., Observations included several individuals noting that the object had no blinking or pulsating lights typical of aircraft., The object appeared to have a fuzzy outline and was described as disc-shaped with a metallic appearance.
sighted object: Bright light in the sky, later reported as disc-shaped object
witness description: Individuals in the vicinity with credible observations.
